Median Filter
info:
Median Filter for Ultrasonic sensor due to the characteristics of the device.

Purge outlying values by creating a buffter of 5 values and then sort by ascending order.

Outstanding values will always be at the top or bottom of the array. Select the middle value of the array to increase filter the data.
